column1: #text=In my english class I was recently assigned to read the book brave new world .
#text=My first idea was to just buy it but when I went to the local bookstore it cost $ 20 .
#text=$ 20 for a book is more than I am willing to pay so I decided to go to the local library .
#text=Calling in ahead to make sure that they did indeed have the book that I wanted , I then headed in the direction of the library .
#text=When I arrive they had already had the book up front as I requested so that all I had to do was go pick it up .
#text=In actuality I had to spend time getting a new library card .
#text=The librarian walked me through the process while also giving me a little background on the book I was about to read .
#text=After I had gotten my new library card I simply gave it to the librarian and she checked out the book for me .
#text=Now it is time to dig in to this novel
